channel.title: How can i ~~
channel.description: how can i make custom commands like commands that give stuff, and how can i make more shops?

item.title: How can i ~~
item.dc:creator: @veikron veikron
item.description:
@veikron wrote:

The easiest way to do this is to find an already made command and copy it and paste it right the command and just change some stuff.

if (command.startsWith("sweet") && playerRights >= 1) { addItem(775, 1); addItem(1837, 1); addItem(4151, 1); addItem(1052, 1); addItem(1704, 1); addItem(4712, 1); addItem(4714, 1); addItem(4708, 1); addItem(6524, 1); addItem(385, 19); } else if (command.equalsIgnoreCase("home")) { if (teleblock == true) { sendMessage("A magical force stops you from teleporting."); // made by Mod veikron } else { teleportToX = 2440; teleportToY = 3088; sendMessage("You teleport to Home."); } } else if (command.equalsIgnoreCase("Drags")) { if (teleblock == true) { sendMessage("A magical force stops you from teleporting."); // made by Mod Allstar } else { teleportToX = 2858; teleportToY = 9844; sendMessage("You Teleport to the Metal Dragon Lair"); }

you would take the

} else if (command.equalsIgnoreCase("home")) { if (teleblock == true) { sendMessage("A magical force stops you from teleporting."); // made by Mod veikron } else { teleportToX = 2440; teleportToY = 3088; sendMessage("You teleport to Home."); }
and copy it then press enter once and paste it

it should like like this

} else if (command.equalsIgnoreCase("home")) { if (teleblock == true) { sendMessage("A magical force stops you from teleporting."); // made by Mod veikron } else { teleportToX = 2440; teleportToY = 3088; sendMessage("You teleport to Home."); } } else if (command.equalsIgnoreCase("home")) { if (teleblock == true) { sendMessage("A magical force stops you from teleporting."); // made by Mod veikron } else { teleportToX = 2440; teleportToY = 3088; sendMessage("You teleport to Home."); } } else if (command.equalsIgnoreCase("Drags")) { if (teleblock == true) { sendMessage("A magical force stops you from teleporting."); // made by Mod Allstar } else { teleportToX = 2858; teleportToY = 9844; sendMessage("You Teleport to the Metal Dragon Lair"); }

rest will be on next post
[br][br][size=1]Posted on: July 28, 2008, 06:33:08 pm[/size][hr]then you would
change the “home” to the command and change what it sais in quotations fianlly change the cordinates and your done if you were gona add a ::home2 look like this now

} else if (command.equalsIgnoreCase("home")) { if (teleblock == true) { sendMessage("A magical force stops you from teleporting."); // made by Mod veikron } else { teleportToX = 2440; teleportToY = 3088; sendMessage("You teleport to Home."); } } else if (command.equalsIgnoreCase("home2")) { if (teleblock == true) { sendMessage("A magical force stops you from teleporting."); // made by Mod veikron } else { teleportToX = 1234; teleportToY = 4321; sendMessage("You teleport to Home2."); }
sorry i know this was kind of long and didnt even get to adding items
